response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value, worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly contribute to your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,400,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 1400000}
